purpose: Facilitate the development of advanced conversational AI applications with voice and multimodal interaction capabilities
principle: Builds on modular architecture with support for various AI and ML models to handle voice and text inputs, enabling seamless multimodal interactions
reusability: Offers a flexible API and plugin system for easy integration into existing applications, supports custom extensions and modules
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and stability, and might lack extensive community support
name: pipecat
description: Open Source framework for voice and multimodal conversational AI
highlight: Comprehensive framework for building voice and multimodal conversational AI applications
